biotools.summary: An algorithm designed to provide a distributed method for assigning accession numbers to genomic features. The website is designed to introduce the utility of the tool by providing resources for mapping human genomic features among various bioinformatic databases and versions of databases with a focus on lncRNAs.

bioschemas.name: UGAHash
